name: Rainbow Step
description: Teru Teru Bouzu, with the mysterious ability to clear the rain, journeys though the world in this 3D adventure game. Why is it always raining in this magical world? Solve the mystery by using the mysterious ability to clear the rain while riding rainbows to explore this magical world.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i5-4570  equivalent or greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 Ti equivalent or greater Storage: 850 MB available space
